simplesect.para: In this case we regard a rectangular waveguide and the effects on the material tensor by the space transformation and the boundary condition PML may overlap (hence inhomogenous space transformation)

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para:
If this kind of boundary condition works stably we will also be able to deal with more general settings (which might for example incorporate angles in between the output and input connector. Author:
Pascal Kraft
